collections_text:
## ArtistsDRIVEN!

ArtistsDRIVEN! is a Norfolk Arts Center workshop program offering high school students in and around Norfolk the chance to explore various art forms, from drawing to wood carving, with guidance from local artists. Join us for a unique, hands-on artistic experience this school year!

[ Learn More ](https://norfolkartscenter.org/artistsdriven/)

## Facility Rentals

If you’re looking for the perfect spot for your next event, look no further than Norfolk Arts Center! With a variety of spaces available, you’re sure to find a space to fit your needs. Spend your special occasion with us!

[ LEARN MORE ](https://norfolkartscenter.org/facility-rental/)

## Membership

Take our Membership Survey Be a valuable part of the Norfolk Arts Center community today! -BRINGING PEOPLE AND THE ARTS TOGETHER- By becoming a NAC member, your dollars support… Participation in art, theatre, music, creative workshops, classes, and…

[ Learn More ](https://norfolkartscenter.org/membership/)

## **Stay up to date with the latest news from the Norfolk Arts Center**

[ JOIN THE MAILING LIST ](https://norfolkartscenter.us5.list-manage.com/subscribe?u=320f625c5081772d385945ef5&id=7f5a7b3e72)

## Your support fuels creativity

**The Norfolk Arts Center mission is to bring people and the arts together, and with your support we can offer free admission to the public, free art classes, we can bring in professional theater and we can distribute art supplies to all. Consider donating today!**
